com.rockagen.malen.properties

Class ServiceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rockagen.malen.properties.ServiceConfig

  • public class ServiceConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Load Service Configuration

    This class have two map.

  • SERVERMAP
  • contentType


    •
      SERVERMAP puts conf/server.xml configuration information

      they like this:

        Connector-port------>8080

        Host-name------>localhost

      CONTENTTYPE puts conf/web.xml configuration information

Author:
AGEN
